example:
() => (
  <Stack>
    <Text>This text appears all of the time. Resize to change other text.</Text>
    <Hide on={["largeMobile", "tablet"]}>
      <Text>
        This text appears on small and wide screens—not large mobile and
        table screens.
      </Text>
    </Hide>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Default hide
info.description: Hide components hide their children on all screens listed in the on prop. By default, the display is inline-block.
